text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS You want people to go back to work? We dont have tests! Who don't know who is sick! Medical Professionals don't have #PPEs! Your irresponsible actions will get even more sick & more will die! People DO NOT listen to Trump. He only cares about the economy, not about us! #COVID19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
